survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Plant Care Subscription Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their experience with plant care subscription services, including satisfaction levels, areas for improvement, and overall service quality.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of plants offered in your subscription?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better granularity in responses. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the variety of plants offered in your subscription?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you value the most in your plant care subscription service? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Access to a plant care community
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture preferences accurately.

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you value the most in your plant care subscription service? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Access to a plant care community

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this plant care subscription service to a friend or colleague?
questions.client_notes: This is a standard NPS question. Use a 5-point scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this plant care subscription service to a friend or colleague?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your plant care subscription experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance your plant care subscription experience?

questions.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with plant health (e.g., pests, wilting) after receiving them from the subscription service?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale for consistency.

script.question_text: How often do you encounter issues with plant health (e.g., pests, wilting) after receiving them from the subscription service?
